deleteAllAIGroupsConfirmation: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all AI-suggested tab groups. Custom groups and ungrouped tabs will remain.
aiSuggestionErrorDescription: Failed to get AI suggestions. Please try again.
noTabsOrGroupsDescription: Add some tabs or use AI suggestions to get started.
signInGoogleDescription: Sign in with your Google account to manage your tabs intelligently.
mockSignInInfo: This is a mock Google Sign-In. Click the button to proceed.
firebaseSignInInfo: Uses Google's secure sign-in. Your data is safe.
inactiveTabManagementDesc: Configure how TabWise handles inactive tabs.
autoSuggestCloseInactiveDesc: Enable to receive AI-powered suggestions for closing tabs you haven't used.
inactiveThresholdDesc: Tabs inactive for longer than this duration will be considered for closure suggestions.
aiPreferencesDesc: Provide hints to the AI for better tab grouping and suggestions.
userPreferencesForAIPlaceholder: e.g., 'Prioritize work-related tabs', 'Group social media separately'
userPreferencesForAIDesc: This text will be sent to the AI to help tailor its suggestions.
localizationDesc: Choose your preferred language for the application.
addTabModalDescription: Manually add a tab to your collection. It will appear in the 'Ungrouped Tabs' section.
createGroupModalDescription: Enter a name for your new custom tab group.
allAIGroupsDeletedDesc: All AI-suggested tab groups have been removed.
noUngroupedTabsDesc: Add new tabs or ungroup existing ones to add to this group.
noTabsToGroupDesc: Add some tabs first before asking AI to group.
noUngroupedTabsToOrganizeDesc: All your tabs are currently in groups or there are no tabs.
noInactiveTabsFoundDesc: All your tabs seem active or important according to the AI.
aiGroupsCreatedAndUpdated: AI created {created} new group(s) and updated {updated} existing group(s).
aiGroupsUpdated: AI updated {updated} existing group(s) with new tabs.
noNewOrUpdatedGroups: AI analyzed your tabs but didn't suggest new groups or add tabs to existing ones.
editGroupModalDescription: Enter the new name for this group.
groupNameCannotBeEmptyDesc: Group name cannot be empty. Please enter a valid name.
cannotOpenTabsFromEmptyGroup: Cannot open tabs from an empty group.
